amendment.description: To address gun violence, improve the availability of records to the National Instant Criminal Background Check System, address mental illness in the criminal justice system, and end straw purchases and trafficking of illegal firearms, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 725 proposed by Senator Grassley.

vote.text: Amendment SA 725, under the order of 4/16/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 48. Record Vote Number: 98.
